trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class represents a connection to a DSML Gateway using SOAP over HTTP.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> rappresenta una connessione a un gateway DSML tramite SOAP su HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> che specifica il server per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier)" /> constructor initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier)" /> inizializza una nuova istanza di una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identifier" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identifier" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> che specifica il server per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.Uri)" /> constructor initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.Uri)" /> inizializza una nuova istanza di una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="uri" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uri" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> che specifica il server per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that contains the network credentials.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> che contiene le credenziali di rete.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> constructor initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> inizializza una nuova istanza di una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identifier" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identifier" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server for the connection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier" /> che specifica il server per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that contains the Network Credentials.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> che contiene le credenziali di rete.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> value that specifies the authentication type to use for this connection.
trans-unit.target: Valore di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> che specifica il tipo di autenticazione da utilizzare per la connessione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> constructor creates and initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> class using the specified identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> crea e inizializza una nuova istanza di una classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> utilizzando l'identificatore, le credenziali di rete e il tipo di autenticazione specificati.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identifier" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identifier" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authType" /> value is not one of the DSML supported values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore <paramref name="authType" /> non è uno dei valori DSML supportati.

trans-unit.source: DSML only supports Anonymous, Ntlm, Basic, Negotiate and digest.
trans-unit.target: DSML supporta solo l'autenticazione anonima, NTLM, di base, di negoziazione e digest.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="authType" /> value is not one of the constants defined in the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <paramref name="authType" /> non è una delle costanti definite nell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" />.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: Valore di richiesta: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto derivato da <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> che fa riferimento alla richiesta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method cancels the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> annulla la richiesta asincrona.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by the corresponding call to <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> non è stato restituito dalla corrispondente chiamata a <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.AuthType" /> property contains one of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> enumeration that specifies the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.AuthType" /> contiene uno dei valori dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> che specifica il tipo di autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> enumeration that specifies the authentication type.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> che specifica il tipo di autenticazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object to send.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> da inviare.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
trans-unit.target: Funzione <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene i dati di stato per la richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method begins asynchronously sending the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object to the server.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> inizia inviando in modo asincrono l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> specificato al server.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto derivato da <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> che fa riferimento all'invio asincrono.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSession" /> method instructs the DSML server to start a new session.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSession" /> indica al server DSML di avviare una nuova sessione.

trans-unit.source: The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo si blocca durante l'attesa di una risposta dal server DSML e il timeout in base al <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when a session is already open on the connection.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando è già aperta una sessione sulla connessione.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the XML returned from the Server in response to the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSession" /> is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando il codice XML restituito dal Server in risposta a <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSession" /> non è corretto.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server or when the server is out of available sessions.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando si verifica un errore di comunicazione con il server DSML o quando sul server sono esaurite le sessioni disponibili.

trans-unit.source: An object derived from <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto derivato da <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> che contiene i dati di stato per la richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method completes an asynchronous send request.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> completa una richiesta di invio asincrona.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> che contiene i risultati della richiesta.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando <paramref name="asyncResult" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Thrown if <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by the current instance from a call to <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando <paramref name="asyncResult" /> non è stato restituito dall'istanza corrente da una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: The request did not complete.
trans-unit.target: La richiesta non è stata completata.

trans-unit.source: No stream is available.
trans-unit.target: Nessun flusso disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when the response returned by server is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando la risposta restituita dal server non è valida.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when abort was previously called or when an error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando l'interruzione è già stata chiamata in precedenza o quando si è verificato un errore durante l'elaborazione della richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.EndSession" /> method ends the session with the DSML server and clears the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.EndSession" /> termina la sessione con il server DSML ed elimina la proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId" />.

trans-unit.source: The method will block while waiting for a response from the DSML server and will time out according to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo si blocca durante l'attesa di una risposta dal server DSML e il timeout in base al <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.Timeout%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If the DSML server has already terminated the session on its own, a <xref:System.Net.WebException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se il server DSML ha già terminato la sessione in modo autonomo, un <xref:System.Net.WebException> verrà generata.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId%2A> is still valid after the exception is thrown, the request never reached the server and the connection is still considered valid.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId%2A> è ancora valida dopo la generazione dell'eccezione, la richiesta non raggiunge mai il server e la connessione è ancora considerata valida.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is a communications failure with the DSML server.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando si verifica un errore di comunicazione con il server DSML.

trans-unit.source: Thrown when there is no open session.
trans-unit.target: Viene generata quando non è aperta alcuna sessione.

trans-unit.source: Sends an object to the DSML server.
trans-unit.target: Invia un oggetto al server DSML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> che contiene la richiesta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> invia un unico oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> che contiene i risultati della richiesta.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The DSML server returned an error response.
trans-unit.target: Il server DSML ha restituito una risposta di errore.

trans-unit.source: The operation returned a failure code.
trans-unit.target: L'operazione ha restituito un codice di errore.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> inviato dal server.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument)" /> method sends a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> object to the DSML server.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument)" /> invia un oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument" /> al server DSML.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlResponseDocument" /> che contiene i risultati della richiesta.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> è null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId" /> property contains the active session ID.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SessionId" /> contiene l'ID della sessione attiva.

trans-unit.source: The active session ID.
trans-unit.target: ID della sessione attiva.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SoapActionHeader" /> property contains the SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.SoapActionHeader" /> contiene l'intestazione di azione SOAP inviata con altre intestazioni HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The SOAP Action Header sent with other HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: Intestazione di azione SOAP inviata con altre intestazioni HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is "#batchRequest".
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di questa proprietà è "#batchRequest".

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.Timeout" /> property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection.Timeout" /> contiene il periodo di tempo, espresso in secondi, prima del timeout di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: Periodo di tempo, espresso in secondi, prima del timeout di <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlSoapHttpConnection" />.
